short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add files from Slack to your online whiteboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save yourself the hassle of managing your Slack files and add them immediately to your canvas. Annotate, organize, and talk them through with your team over voice-chat.   With the Explain Everything Chrome Extension you’ll access your Slack files right from the project.

After you install the extension, authorize Explain Everything in your Slack workspace in order to access the files in it.

WHAT’S EXPLAIN EVERYTHING
The only collaborative online whiteboard with voice chat, recording, video editing tools and web video link sharing.

WITH EXPLAIN EVERYTHING YOU CAN
• Whiteboard together in real-time with voice chat on any-device, anywhere. Invite guests with a link or collaboration code to join your project, record everything, and then share.
• Capture your interactions and voice to create just-in-time video messages and stories.
• Turn an infinite canvas into a mixed-media playground of videos, images, text, and sketches  that captivate, engage, and inspire others.
• Start projects faster with pre-made templates or create and save your own.
